description:
Tad`s Poliwrath is a very strong Pokémon that wears a golden belt for being the most powerful Pokémon is Tad`s local village.
Despite the type disavantage, Poliwrath beat Ash`s Pikachu and then went on to defeat Ash`s Charizard by using ice beam.
Ash managed to nurse Charizard back to full health after the Ice Beam and Charizard began to obey Ash in battle. In a rematch, Ash and Charizard defeated Tad and his Poliwrath.
name: Nyorobon (Hide)
